remarks: In an ordered ring, the strict ordering is compatible with the ring multiplication operation.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Sep-2018.)
statement:
orngmullt.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
orngmullt.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
orngmullt.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
orngmullt.l $e |- .< = ( lt ` R ) $.
orngmullt.1 $e |- ( ph -> R e. oRing ) $.
orngmullt.4 $e |- ( ph -> R e. DivRing ) $.
orngmullt.2 $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
orngmullt.3 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
orngmullt.x $e |- ( ph -> .0. .< X ) $.
orngmullt.y $e |- ( ph -> .0. .< Y ) $.
orngmullt $p |- ( ph -> .0. .< ( X .x. Y ) ) $.
